name: Template Review Workflow (Planning)
description: High-level plan structure for auditing templates, deduplicating, fixing them, and aligning the registry.
inputs: Request scope MUST cover listing, deduplication, review/fix, registry update, and gap analysis.
AGENTS.md rules MUST be read and acknowledged.
meta-plan for the same effort MUST exist and be approved/acknowledged.
steps: Inventory all templates (JSON and Markdown) and detect duplicates or mismatches.
Review each template for internal coherence, placeholders, acceptance, and stage alignment; note fixes.
Apply minimal fixes and normalization without introducing unnecessary complexity.
Update the template registry to reflect the real set of templates and schema values.
Identify missing templates and outline a concrete generation plan.
Summarize acceptance evidence and HALT for operator review when required.
acceptance: Plan covers inventory, review/fix, registry update, and gap analysis with at least one acceptance check.
Operator review acknowledged before execution when not running in full-auto mode.
